casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Ernest Ray HOFFMAN. No. 612P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Ernest Ray Hoffman, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 2nd day of November 2005 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Richmond County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005."
